attributes.action: stop using taxpayer pounds to pay for groceries purchased by the public service employees known as Members of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is immoral to take taxes off people like me to then use those same taxes to pay for the food taken by MPs and their families, without also allowing every public service employee in the country to charge the cost of their weekly groceries to the taxpayer.  To allow this theft to continue implies that there is something special about what Members of Parliament are doing when there are hundreds of thousands of other employees who necessarily have second homes near their place of work and have no access to tax free taxpayer funded allowances and are obliged to bear the full cost themselves

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
